headline: T-Mobile launches free offer for customers after major loss
summary: T-Mobile is betting big on the holiday season to boost its wireless customer numbers after facing controversy earlier this year for hiking prices, cutting discounts, and changing its phone plans. In recent weeks, T-Mobile has made concerted efforts to lure customers away from its competitors. On ...

headline: T-Mobile: Recent Underperformance Set To Continue
summary: T-Mobile US, Inc. is downgraded to Sell expecting further earnings estimate revisions and multiple compression. Learn more about TMUS stock here.

headline: Will Leadership Shift and New Perks Strategy Change T-Mobile US' (TMUS) 5G Growth Narrative?
summary: T-Mobile US recently announced several developments, including appointing longtime executive Jonathan A. Freier as Chief Operating Officer, collaborating with SERHANT on its SuperMobile connectivity offering for real estate agents, declaring a US$1.02 per-share cash dividend payable in March 2026, and rolling out new Magenta Status member perks alongside upcoming investor conference remarks. Together, these moves highlight T-Mobile’s focus on strengthening leadership, showcasing...

headline: AT&T cuts controversial policy to seal billion-dollar acquisition
summary: AT&T, one of the top phone carriers in the U.S., is eyeing the acquisition of spectrum licenses from a major rival amid heightened competition. Spectrum licenses are government-issued authorizations that give a company exclusive rights to use specific radio frequency bands for wireless ...
